entities.name: noise
entities.description: Noise is described as an entity that can spread its wings and soar out of the open window. (Excerpt: 'noise, spread her enormous wings and soared out of the open window.')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a person who watches noise out of sight and then crawls under his bed to get cake. (Excerpt: 'Harry watched her out of sight,  then crawled under his bed...')

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as a person who has nothing but grapefruit on his birthday. (Excerpt: 'He had cake, and Dudley had nothing but grapefruit;')

relationships.description: Harry watched noise out of sight. (Excerpt: 'Harry watched her out of sight,  then crawled under his bed...')
Harry ate the cake he pulled out from under the floorboard. (Excerpt: 'He sat there on the floor eating it, savoring the happiness that was floodin g through him.')
Dudley had grapefruit on his birthday. (Excerpt: 'He had cake, and Dudley had nothing but grapefruit;')
